name: torX: the video game
description:
"You DON'T question the résumé!"

- Based on the 1994 sci-fi thriller starring Tom Cruise and John Travolta, torX: the video game is a long lost classic. Play as Ted torX (Travolta) as he and Marlon (Cruise) attempt to not question the résumé in this 2d side-scroller of the highest (lowest) order.
